message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to offer it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $160. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $165, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $145.
I'm not willing to go below $155. I think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140.
I'm not going to go back to $140, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $140 and $155, which is $147.50. That's my final offer.
I'm not willing to go above $135.
